author: eric
post: The main point of the paper is not the ‘ponytail’, but the coincidence between the calcium deposits between both pieces. The sudarium is not a paiting, there is no image of any kind AFIK, which means no gesso. So then, if deposits of the same type are found in exactly the same locations that makes the case interesting. Why? Because the pieces are C14 dated centuries apart..
